channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control RTE (SL)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control RTE (SL)

item.title: CVE-2022-22514|2024-08-03T03:14:55.446Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker can gain access to a dereferenced pointer contained in a request. The accesses can subsequently lead to local overwriting of memory in the CmpTraceMgr, whereby the attacker can neither gain the values read internally nor control the values to be written. If invalid memory is accessed, this results in a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-22516|2024-08-03T03:14:55.441Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: The SysDrv3S driver in the CODESYS Control runtime system on Microsoft Windows allows any system user to read and write within restricted memory space.

item.title: CVE-2022-22513|2024-08-03T03:14:55.460Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker can cause a null pointer dereference in the CmpSettings component of the affected CODESYS products which leads to a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-30792|2024-08-03T07:03:38.599Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpChannelServer of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new communication channel connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-22517|2024-08-03T03:14:55.454Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An unauthenticated, remote attacker can disrupt existing communication channels between CODESYS products by guessing a valid channel ID and injecting packets. This results in the communication channel to be closed.

item.title: CVE-2022-22519|2024-08-03T03:14:55.378Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker can send a specific crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests causing a buffer over-read resulting in a crash of the webserver of the CODESYS Control runtime system.

item.title: CVE-2022-22515|2024-08-03T03:14:55.437Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, authenticated attacker could utilize the control program of the CODESYS Control runtime system to use the vulnerability in order to read and modify the configuration file(s) of the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2022-30791|2024-08-03T07:03:38.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpBlkDrvTcp of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new TCP connections. Existing connections are not affected.
